      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_115114</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_115114</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Boiling point-composition diagram for a liquid mixture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kochendes Punkt-Aufbau Diagramm für eine 
flüssige Mischung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagramme d'ébullition de point-composition pour
un mélange liquide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama fervendo da ponto-composição para uma 
mistura líquida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema d'ebollizione della punto-composizione per 
una miscela liquida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βράζοντας διάγραμμα σημείο-σύνθεσης για ένα υγρό 
μίγμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama de la punta-composicio'n que hierve para
una mezcla líquida</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates how the boiling point changes as chemical composition is varied for a mixture of two liquids, A and B, and is used to explain how distillation works.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical composition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixtures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vapour pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, wie der 
Siedepunkt ändert, während chemischer Aufbau für eine Mischung von 
zwei Flüssigkeiten, A und B verändert wird, und verwendet wird, zu 
erklären, wie Destillation arbeitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre comment le point 
d'ébullition change pendant que la composition chimique est changée 
pour un mélange de deux liquides, A et B, et est utilisé pour 
expliquer comment la distillation fonctionne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra como o ponto fervendo muda 
enquanto a composição química é variada para uma mistura de dois 
líquidos, A e B, e é usado explicar como o distillation trabalha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra come il punto di 
ebollizione cambia mentre la composizione chimica è variata per una 
miscela di due liquidi, A e B ed è usato spiegare come la 
distillazione funziona.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί πώς οι να βράσουν αλλαγές
σημείου ως χημική σύνθεση είναι ποικίλες για ένα μίγμα δύο 
υγρών, Α και β, και χρησιμοποιείται για να εξηγήσει πώς η 
απόσταξη λειτουργεί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra cómo la punta que hierve 
cambia como la composición química se varía para una mezcla de dos 
líquidos, A y B, y se utiliza explicar cómo la destilación trabaja.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Siedepunkt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemischer Aufbau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Destillation</string>
          </keyword>
